title: A hen
content: A hen. Ted is a hen. The hen is red. Ted is a red hen.

title: The ball
content: This is a ball. The ball is blue. Look at the blue ball. The blue ball is big.

title: The ball
content: This is a book. These are also books. That is a book. Those are all books.

title: Banana
content: I am a banana. I am yellow. I am soft. I am sweet and delicious
